song_lyrics: Pragaṭ Prabhujī maḷiyā jene, nathī khāmī kashī tene;
Karyā Jagdīsh jeṇe rājī, teṇe sahu dev pūjyājī... °ṭek
Karyu het santanī sāthe, maraṇ dukh nā rahe māthe;
Pāmī nardeh ā rūḍo, tajyo kusang to pūro... Pragaṭ° 1
Dharyo shubh dharma jo ange, thayā te shuddha satsange;
Pragaṭnī bhakti jo bhāve, enā guṇ dev nitya gāve... Pragaṭ° 2
Dharyo vairāgya draḍh jeṇe, viṣhay sukh tuchchha gaṇyu teṇe;
Bhaje nitya Vishvavihārī, dhanya nar deh te dhārī... Pragaṭ° 3
title: Pragaṭ Prabhujī maḷiyā jene nathī khāmī kashī tene

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-55: Acharya Viharilalji Maharaj

Category: Shri Harina Pad
